docs.abstract: In this lesson, students learn about the changing public perception of cigarettes over the century. They then create a visual timeline for classroom display, and design a survey on people's views on cigarette smoking for homework.

byline.original: By ANNISSA HAMBOUZ and YASMIN CHIN EISENHAUER

docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.
docs.snippet: In this lesson, students learn about the changing public perception of cigarettes over the century. They then create a visual timeline for classroom display, and design a survey on people's views on cigarette smoking for homework.

headline.print_headline: Tracing the Cigarette’s Path From Sexy to Deadly
headline.main: Tracing the Cigarette’s Path From Sexy to Deadly

docs.lead_paragraph: A conclusion that seems obvious today took most of a century to reach.
docs.snippet: A conclusion that seems obvious today took most of a century to reach.

headline.seo: The Women's War - Sara Corbett - Iraq - Soldiers - Women - Abuse

docs.lead_paragraph:
Many female soldiers have lived through the terrible
violence of the war in Iraq. Others have experienced
sexual assault — or worse, a combination of the two. They have found themselves struggling to cope with their lives.
